release.info: New features, bug fixes and performance improvements.
release.new: Added update profile picture. Just click on the profile picture circle
Added functionality to upload job card picture. On ticket screen, click on the gallery icon with a plus to attach picture of job card
Added meeting notifier. On the priority indicator, a purple indicator colour has been added to denote upcoming meetings
release.bugfix: Fixed layout appearance on smaller screens
